results.overview: A coroner finds a capsule in the head of a heavily mutilated corpse, containing a phone number and single word: the name of his daughter.
results.title: Cut Off

results.overview: A young woman makes a surprising discovery about the husband of her late best friend.
results.title: The New Girlfriend

results.overview: The rise of a raucous hayseed named Lonesome Rhodes from itinerant Ozark guitar picker to local media rabble-rouser to TV superstar and political king-maker. Marcia Jeffries is the innocent Sarah Lawrence girl who discovers the great man in a back-country jail and is the first to fall under his spell.
results.title: A Face in the Crowd

results.overview: Representative No. 7 exposes the hidden dark side of the Unnamed Footage Festival and their sponsor in crime, Waketrix. Learn the tragic truth behind the death of Vernon Herman Salinger with exclusive photos and footage uncovered by Truth Seekers Network.
results.title: TS-17: The Truth About V.H.S.

results.original_title: 宇宙海賊キャプテンハーロック アルカディア号の謎
results.overview: The story on Arcadia's mystery, on which the 13th television episode was based.
results.title: Space Pirate Captain Harlock: Mystery Of The Arcadia

results.overview: The story tells the story of a collusion between Hong Kong police and criminals in 1973, under the instigation of the British, they embezzled huge profits and poisoned the citizens. The Governor of Hong Kong established the Independent Commission Against Corruption
results.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong

results.overview: When they realize the times are changing, five crooks decide to switch from bank robberies to personality abductions.
results.title: Money Money Money

results.overview: Mickey accidentally takes a seal home, after it sneaks into his picnic basket. When Mickey takes a bath, the seal is discovered and Mickey returns him to the park. Later, however, Mickey and Pluto discover that the bathroom is filled with seals!
results.title: Mickey and the Seal

results.overview: Following a bungled robbery, three violent criminals take a young woman, a middle-aged man, and a child hostage and force them to drive them outside Rome to help them make a clean getaway.
results.title: Rabid Dogs

results.original_title: Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain
results.overview: An intimate, behind-the-scenes look at how an anonymous chef became a world-renowned cultural icon. This unflinching look at Anthony Bourdain reverberates with his presence, in his own voice and in the way he indelibly impacted the world around him.
results.title: Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain

results.original_title: On se calme et on boit frais à Saint-Tropez
results.overview: A teenager lies to her parents and goes to the South of France instead of studying for the summer. Meeting with her not-so faithful boyfriend and his DJ friend, she discovers her father is also there - with another woman.
results.title: Let’s Calm Down and Have a Cool Drink in Saint-Tropez

results.overview: A dirty bomb goes off in Los Angeles, jamming freeways and spreading a toxic cloud.
results.title: Right at Your Door

results.original_title: Das Mädchen mit der heißen Masche
results.overview: Rolf (Michael Cromer), a sex-advice columnist and a lecher, has affairs with numerous women, but never a permanent relationship. Suzanne, one of his ex-lovers, offers to bet that no woman can get Rolf to propose marriage, a bet her girlfriend Andrea (Sybil Danning) eagerly accepts. But there's a catch: To win the bet, Andrea must get the womanizing Rolf to commit to marriage without first going to bed with him.
results.title: Loves of a French Pussycat

results.overview: Since his beloved violin was broken, Nasser-Ali Khan, one of the most renowned musicians of his day, has lost all taste for life. Finding no instrument worthy of replacing it, he decides to confine himself to bed to await death.
results.title: Chicken with Plums

results.overview: Fleeing 1930s New York and leaving behind a chequered past, the giltzy divorcee Mrs Stella Erlynne travels to Italy's sun-dappled Amalfi coast. Mrs Erlynne's appearance causes a stir amongst the visiting aristocracy. Based on the Oscar Wilde play "Lady Windemere's Fan."
results.title: A Good Woman

results.overview: A teenager in modern-day Miami finds a magic lantern and out pops a genie, who's been asleep for 200 years and in his gratitude grants the boy several wishes.
results.title: Aladdin

results.original_title: Acéra ou Le bal des sorcières
results.overview: In mud flats along the coast of Brittany we watch acera, small ball-shaped mollusks that are about two inches in diameter. They rest in mud; then, in water, they dance, their skirt-like hood spreading like a dervish's cassock. They spin and spin. The film adds musical accompaniment. We watch them mate and secrete eggs: acera are both male and female, and can form chains with other acera in which they simultaneously mate as a male and as a female. The eggs hatch, and the cycle begins again.
results.title: Acera, or the Witches' Dance

results.overview: An ambitious New York socialite plans an extravagant dinner party as her businessman husband, Oliver, contends with financial woes, causing a lot of tension between the couple. Meanwhile, their high-society friends and associates, including the gruff Dan Packard and his sultry spouse, Kitty, contend with their own entanglements, leading to revelations at the much-anticipated dinner.
results.title: Dinner at Eight

results.overview: Filmmakers expose the horrifying mass executions of accused communists in Indonesia and those who are celebrated in their country for perpetrating the crime.
results.title: The Act of Killing

results.overview: Accompany PJ Harvey and Seamus Murphy on a journey through the creative process behind PJ Harvey's new album, conceived by their travels around the globe.
results.title: A Dog Called Money
